Problem Identification: Predict fault occurrence from sensor, TTF and equipment parameters
Data Issues / EDA: Large dataset (810,643 rows); class imbalance; missing numeric values; timestamp normalization (time)
ML Model features: RandomForestClassifier; median imputation; numeric sensors only; excludes time/stage/Lot/runnum/recipe/recipe_step; class_weight=balanced; feature importance
Results: Metrics shown in app: Accuracy/Precision/Recall/F1/ROC AUC; confusion matrix; model exported as model_artifacts.pkl
Business Impact: Reduce downtime and scrap; earlier interventions; improved OEE and throughput

Problem Identification: Same objective with faster, chunked training
Data Issues / EDA: Chunk-based I/O; per-chunk median imputation; target sanitized to {0,1}; sample-weight balancing
ML Model features: SGDClassifier (logistic); partial_fit over configurable chunks (5kâ€“50k); bootstrap ensures both classes present; progress bars
Results: Streaming evaluation over 200k rows with aggregated metrics and confusion matrix
Business Impact: Rapid iteration for large data; enables faster retraining cycles

Problem Identification: Score remaining live records and persist outputs
Data Issues / EDA: Consistent preprocessing with training (median impute; same features)
ML Model features: predict_batch.py reads fault_detection_manufacturing; loads model_artifacts.pkl; writes predictions_live.csv
Results: CSV contains predicted_fault and probability (plus time when available)
Business Impact: Operational scoring for production monitoring and alerts

Problem Identification: Unified UI for data preview, training, evaluation and inference
Data Issues / EDA: Data Dictionary display; feature selection (numeric-only/admin toggles); time conversion to numeric
ML Model features: app.py with pinned table fault_detection_manufacturing; 500k/200k split; configurable fast mode and chunk size
Results: Interactive metrics, confusion matrix, feature ranking, model download; inference on live records
Business Impact: Stakeholder reviews; faster debugging; bridges data science and operations

Results: Artifacts updated on training/evaluation; report summarizes features and metrics
Business Impact: Traceability; governance; easier handoff to engineering/operations
